sentence.Network_en: Her matronly fame was trodden under all men's feet.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那主妇的声名任凭所有的人践踏在脚下.

sentence.Network_en: " No modest, matronly dove grays and lilacs tonight.
sentence.Network_cn: " 今天晚上用不着穿那种庄重的主妇式的紫灰色和淡紫色.

sentence.Network_en: Mary, in her matronly days , became as solid in figure as her mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛丽在成为主妇后, 跟她的母亲一样精明能干.

entry.def: You can use matronly to describe a woman who is fairly fat and looks middle-aged, especially if you think the clothes she is wearing are not fashionable or attractive.

example.ex: ...a matronly woman with an air of authority.
example.tran: 身材微胖、不怒自威的中年女人

means.word_mean: 1. befitting or characteristic of a fully mature woman;
